name: Gumstein: The Awakening
description: Solve puzzles and evade hazards using several interesting abilities such as sticking to walls, splitting, and launching your other half through multiple levels on your quest to find Ruby
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel core i5 (or equivalent) Graphics: On board Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel core i7 (or equivalent) Graphics: On board Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
